product_name: Estee LauderDayWear Matte Oil-Control Anti-Oxidant Moisturizer Gel Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingGoodbye, shine. Hello, matte. Estée Lauder DayWear Matte Oil-Control antioxidant Moisturizer Gel Cream is an ultra-light gel cream moisturizer that helps control oil and minimize shine, reducing the look of pores and leaving skin fresh, soft and hydrated.
details: DetailsBenefitsFace the day with confidence. It's more than matte. It's just what your skin needs.Includes powerful MoistureMatte Technology.Controls oil up to 10 hours and helps skin minimize visible shine all day.Gives skin a healthy matte finish.Reduces the look of pores.Helps resist the first signs of aging.Skin feels fresh, smooth, soft, hydrated.Ultra light gel cream texture.Ideal for Oily skin.Dermatologist-tested.Non-acnegenic; won't clog pores.Item 2502687How To UseApply moisturizer over face as a last step in your skincare regimen. Avoid eye area.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Isododecane, Butylene Glycol, Polypropylene, Dimethicone, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Glycerin, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate / Vp Copolymer, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Citrullus Vulgaris (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Narcissus Tazetta Bulb Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Trehalose, Ergothioneine, Algae Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Caffeine, Acetyl Glucosamine, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract / Extrait D'orge, Thermus Thermophillus Ferment, Polysilicone-11, Acrylates / C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylbisiminomethylguaiacol Manganese Chloride, Lecithin, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Laureth-23, Tromethamine, Citric Acid, Cyclodextrin, Caprylyl Glycol, Laureth-4, Oleth-10, Sodium PCA, Silica, Fragrance (Parfum), Hexylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Salicylate, Blue 1 (CI 42090).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply moisturizer over face as a last step in your skincare regimen. Avoid eye area.

reviews.headline: Best moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is the first moisturizer that has helped control my oily shine. Thank you so much to the lady that helped me. I was skeptical at first. I was completely surprised.  I may start sampling other Este Lauder products.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I have extremely oily skin and so far this is the only product that helps reduce the shine through out the day. i also have acne prone skin and this don't make me break out.

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: I tend to get a shiny face so wanted to love this, but it ends up breaking down and pilling off my skin in little balls. Also it just doesnt moisturize the way that I would like it to. My face was dry at the end of the day and flaking! Really disappointing.

reviews.headline: Not good
reviews.comments: Made my face red, itch and feel like sandpaper. Super dissapointed.

reviews.headline: It's Okay
reviews.comments: I have tried a lot of oil control and mattifying moisturizers for my mostly oily combo skin. This one works okay for winter, but I will not even attempt to use it in the warmer months, even on dry areas. Disappointed, considering the price tag, but I will keep it. I do enjoy the light scent, which says a lot considering how sensitive to scents I am (strong ones will trigger an immediate level 10 migraine).

reviews.headline: Oil in control
reviews.comments: I have tried a few different oil control creams but nothing has taken away my redness while controlling my oil. Wish they made this in a face wash.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I have very oily skin and Ive been using for a year under my oil control primer and makeup and it really works!!! I go til mid afternoon before I need to powder my tzone area.

reviews.headline: So soft!
reviews.comments: This makes my skin feel so soft and it smells amazing!

reviews.headline: I would recommend this product
reviews.comments: I use this moisturizer every morning, even when I don't wear makeup. I no longer buy primer because this moisturizer does its job. I'm glad I tried it..I will no longer buy primer and moisturizer. This moisturizer is both in one.

reviews.headline: Only product that works for my oily skin
reviews.comments: I've tried so many products (even contine to try when i get free samples) and nothing works as good as this product for oily skin. It's a large container so it lasts a while

reviews.headline: Leaves white film
reviews.comments: Absolutely awful.  It looks terrible under make up,  and leaves a white film on the skin when dry.  Would not purchase again.

reviews.headline: Good for oily skin
reviews.comments:
This product is good for oily skin but the fragrance 
Was a bit too much for me. Since it was the only product that had fragrance from all my skincare products it made me break out. Only reason why I had  to return it.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff!
reviews.comments: I love this face creme. It doesn't take a lot to go on and doesn't feel heavy on my skin. My t-zone is a bit oily and this helps some but doesn't stay matte all day but i'm going to stick with it just because it feels great and doesn't beak me out.

reviews.headline: Skin is important
reviews.comments: Honestly my skin used to get so oily I started my skincare change & now that I changed my skincare this is one moisturizer that helped my skin look so good! Even under make up this moisturizer & night serum make my makeup look so good! I recommend to introduce skincare slowly so you won't purge or if you do you know why! I didn't purge with none of Estée Lauder's products I highly recommend for you to try & give some time! Also I want to add I live in a desert state so if you know you know lol

reviews.headline: Not greasy
reviews.comments: I do like this moisturizer. It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave my face greasy or sticky. Yay!  The only con is the scent. It's got a cucumber scent which isn't terrible, just not my favorite. I would buy again.

reviews.headline: Love This Stuff
reviews.comments: This is the perfect amount of moisture! I'm a combination skin type and can't handle a normal cream moisturizer. This soaks in and my face loves it.

reviews.headline: Overall Very Good for Super Oily Skin
reviews.comments: I'll start off by saying my skin is VERY sensitive and will dry out if I even look at the wrong product. At the same time it's SUPER oily. The oil control format is a game changer!!! It does dry my skin out a little if I use it everyday so I interchange it with the Neutragena's Hydroboost. It works so well at containing my oil throughout the day and my face is still pretty matte by the end of the day. I try to keep the usage for when I'm wearing makeup or not washing my hair that day (so my face doesn't add extra oil) because it is quite pricey and I find I need a use a little more than normal to cover my entire face and neck. But if you're super oily and looking for relief give this a try!

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: This product is amazing for oily skin. It makes your skin feel mate without it drying your skin out. It has a pleasant clean smell. Will definitely be buying again!

reviews.headline: Estée Lauder DayWear Matte Oil Control moisturizer
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this. It's lightweight, a light scent of cucumber, cooling gel with a hefty price tag to last only about 4 hours. So not quite worth it. Initial use I was impressed but after lunch time my forehead looked just as it normally does. Tried for a while and same only works for a few hours. Also, I was only using in my T-zone. But doesn't quite work for me.

reviews.headline: Pretty jar but won't repurchase
reviews.comments:
My skin tends to be combination/oily, and I can be prone to some sheen. As I have entered my 40s, I find a facial moisturizer can be very beneficial. I was excited to try this one when it was on sale, since the matte function of it plus moisturizing properties sounded perfect. 

The jar is gorgeous, and the product feels light going on. It absorbs very quickly, and I find myself using a lot more than I normally would with other facial moisturizers. The smell is light and pleasant and if I'm having a no makeup day, the overall look of my face is quite nice. Unfortunately, I've tried several foundations over this moisturizer of varying formulas, and the all end up caking on top of my skin and looking blotchy and uneven. So I'm going to finish this on my days off and not repurchase. It's almost gone after about a month anyway.

properties.name: Cons

values.label: Made my makeup look very dry. Hard to smooth on
I don't think this works well with foundation
Can see it under my makeup

display_values: Can see it under my makeup
I don't think this works well with foundation
Made my makeup look very dry. Hard to smooth on

properties.name: Pros

values.label: It makes my skin feel super soft after I put on

display_values: It makes my skin feel super soft after I put on

media.headline: Great as long as you don't apply foundation

faceoff_positive.comments: I have finally found a product that actually keeps me from being an oil slick! I have SUPER oily and acne prone skin! I apply my foundation around 8 in the morning and by 10, my foundation is slipping and separating and my pores are huge, and I am as shiny as a babies bottom! I would constantly have to blot with blotting paper about 3-4 times a day. The Estee Lauder Day Wear Matte Oil Control allows me to go through my work day without having to worry about any of that! I blotted once just to see and the sheet wasn't even half as used as what it used to be before. I know it is a bit pricey but completely worth it and trust me a little goes a long way! I have tried MANY more affordable oil control products and moisturizers to help keep me matte all day or for at least more than two hours and nothing has worked, at all! Even Cetaphil. I have searched far and wide to find a wonder product for the best deal, but with many failures, I broke down and ordered this and I DO NOT regret a single penny spent! It is so refreshing, smells amazing, I can tell a difference right away, and it goes so well under my foundation! Makes my makeup look beautiful all day! I was compelled to write a review for this one because of the wonders it has done for me and the confidence it has given back to me! I Highly recommend!
faceoff_positive.headline: I will be purchasing again!

faceoff_negative.comments:
This possibly clogged My pores! It did work quickly on my oily skin that was a plus! But, the negative it didn't work with double wear Estée Lauder foundation at all! I wasn't impressed on the look it actually brought attention to my pores and imperfections!
I think this works well alone but not with foundation!
I was really hoping this extremely pricey cream would work but I would say thumbs down!
faceoff_negative.headline: Great as long as you don't apply foundation

rollup.name: DayWear Matte Oil-Control Anti-Oxidant Moisturizer Gel Cream
